p: Three strains of Gram-positive bacteria that infect animals, namely, Staphylococcus aureus, Streptococcus pyogenes, and Listeria monocytogenes, and three strains of Gram-negative pathogenic bacteria, Escherichia coli O157 H:7, Salmonella typhi, and Campylobacter jejuni, were obtained from Ethiopian Public Health Institute (EPHI) in icebox and transport media.
